msg.msgText: Name Name of the log file. Use the show log list command to list the supported log files. The webui-messages*.log files are excluded from the operation. MaxLogSize The maximum size of the log file before it is rotated in megabytes. The value must contain M suffix. Options:1M-25M RotationCount The number of old log files that are kept in the rotation. Options:1-5

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
